questions.question_text: Which property controls the changes in cost and resource plans with respect to the change in the start date of a demand or project?

choices.D: ‘Calculate ROI percentage based on a project’s estimated cost and its net value’.
choices.A: ‘Change Resource Plan, Cost Plan and Benefit Plan Start Date with Demand or Project Start Date Change’.
choices.B: ‘Enable altering of planned date for task in WIP/Closed’.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Note: The project property Change Resource Plan and Cost Plan Start Date with Demand or Project Start Date Change controls the changes in cost and resource plans with respect to the change in the start date of a demand or project.

Source; https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-business-management/page/product/project-management/task/change-planned-date-demand-project.html
